text: Baluna, ‘ami ki asamanasamuha o yaminera srasta allah‌ chara an'yake abhibhabakarupe grahana karaba [1]? Tini'i khabara dana karena kintu tamke khabara deya haya na [2]. Baluna ‘niscaya ami adesa peyechi yara isalama grahana kareche tadera madhye yena ami prathama byakti ha'i [3],ara (amake ara'o adesa kara hayeche) ‘apani musarikadera antarbhukta habena na.’
